mapper.update: update order_tbl set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commodity_code = #{commodityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, money = #{money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rank = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
